articles.description: Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli were snapped laughing, chatting and having fun at Team India's Diwali celebrations on Saturday.
articles.content: Amidst the ongoing Diwali celebrations, the Indian cricket team finds themselves engaged in a crucial ODI World Cup 2023 match on November 12. Despite the match commitment, the Board of Control for C… [+1808 chars]

articles.description: After back-to-back wins, the Perth Scorchers can reclaim top spot on the WBBL|09 table and leapfrog the Thunder with victory on neutral territory in Melbourn...
